programme.title: מחכים לכם בשישי ב-yes MOVIES KIDS
programme.desc: כל סרטי הילדים והמשפחה מהערוץ זמינים עבורכם ללא תוספת תשלום עכשיו ב-yesVOD KIDS. ערוץ yes MOVIES KIDS משדר בסופי שבוע ובחגים.

programme.title: הפינגווינים ממדגסקר (מדובב)
programme.desc: חברים מדובבים: סרטים בשפה שלנו. הפינגווינים המשעשעים מסרטי "מדגסקר" מככבים בסרט משלהם. הפעם הם משתפים פעולה עם ארגון ריגול מיוחד, במאבק מול תמנון ערמומי. דיבוב עברית: מיכאל הנגבי. 2014. כ' עב'.

programme.title: חלומו של דולפין (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סיפורו המופלא של דניאל, דולפין צעיר שחולם לשחות בגלים הגדולים שמחוץ ללגונה הקטנה שבה הוא חי. לילה אחד ניתנת לו ההזדמנות, והוא יוצא למסע קסום במרחבי הים הפתוח. במאי: אדוארדו שולדט. 2010. כ' עב'.

programme.title: הכלב והחתולה: המרדף המטורף (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיה לכל המשפחה בדיבוב אמיר שורוש ("ראמזי") ומיקי מוכתר עורי. גור כלבים שבלע יהלום יקר וחתולה מפונקת נפגשים במקרה לאחר שנשכחו בשדה התעופה. כעת עליהם למצוא דרך לחזור לבעליהם, בעוד אחריהם רודף שוטר שמחפש אחר היהלום. 2024.

programme.title: החיים הסודיים של חיות המחמד 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. המשך ללהיט מבית אילומיניישן ('המיניונים'). הצצה נוספת לחייהם הסודיים ומלאי ההרפתקאות של צמד הכלבים מקס ודיוק, ויתר חבריהם חיות המחמד, כאשר הבעלים שלהם לא בסביבה. דיבוב: עידו מוסרי. במאי: כריס רנו. 2019. כ' עב'.

programme.title: אגלי דולס (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מעוררת השראה. האגלי דולס חיות בשלווה וללא דאגות בעיר 'אגליוויל'. העניינים משתנים כאשר הבובות מגיעות לארץ המושלמות, ומתמודדות שם לראשונה עם הקושי בלהיות שונה. דיבוב: שירלי לילו. במאי: קלי אסבורי. 2019. כ' עב'.

programme.title: כלב מי שמנגן 3 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מוזיקלית. לאחר מסע הופעות מסביב לעולם, חוזר בודי כלב הרוקנרול לכפר הולדתו ומצטרף לצוות שופטים בתוכנית ריאליטי מוזיקלית, כדי ללמד את הדור הבא איך עושים את זה נכון... דיבוב: ברק ברויטמן. במאי: אנתוני בל. 2022. כ' עב'.

programme.title: גנוב על העולם (מדובב)
programme.desc: להיט האנימציה עם המיניונים שמגניבים אותנו מחדש! גרו מגלה לראשונה שיש לו אח התאום והמוצלח. יחדיו, הם מתכננים לקחת מבלתזאר הנבל את היהלום שגנב ולהציל את העולם. קולות: אוהד שחר. בימוי: קייל בלדה, פייר קופין. 2017. כ' עב'.

programme.title: גנוב על החיים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הסרט הרביעי בסדרת סרטי האנימציה המצליחה. גרו ומשפחתו מקבלים למשפחה חבר חדש: גרו ג'וניור, שמתעקש לענות את אביו שרק רוצה קצת אהבה מבנו התינוק. במקביל אויב חדש-ישן מאיים על כל המשפחה. דיבוב: יניב ביטון, ליאת הר לב. 2024.

programme.title: להציל את החווה (מדובב)
programme.desc: דרמת הרפתקאות מרגשת ומצחיקה. אנני וחברה הטוב ביותר - הכלב ראנט יוצאים לתחרות כלבים באנגליה במטרה להציל את החווה המשפחתית באוסטרליה, רק שראנט מאוד ביישן... עם: לילי לה טורה. דיבוב: אמלי קקון סלונים. אוסטרליה/אנגליה, 2024.

programme.title: אסטריקס ואובליקס: הממלכה התיכונה (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית הרפתקאות. שנת 50 לפנה"ס. בתו היחידה של קיסר סין נמלטת מפני נסיך מושחת שהשתלט על המדינה, ומגיעה במהלך מנוסתה למדינת גאליה. שם היא זוכה להגנה משני הלוחמים האמיצים (אך גם מגושמים), אסטריקס ואובליקס. דיבוב עב'. 2023.

programme.title: חברים דמיוניים
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. ילדה צעירה מגלה כי יש לה יכולת מופלאה - לראות במציאות את החברים הדמיוניים של ילדים אחרים. כעת היא מנסה לאחד בין החברים הדמיוניים לילדים, אשר ננטשו עם השנים. עם: ריאן ריינולדס. במאי: ג'ון קרסינסקי. 2024.

programme.title: בלאגן על ארבע (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה. כלבלב מפונק מוצא עצמו ברחוב לאחר שנמלט מהילדים החמדנים של בעליו הקודמים. כעת כשהוא מנסה לשרוד בעולם האמיתי, באים לעזרתו כלב רחוב קשוח ומוזיקאית צעירה. דיבוב: דן קיזלר, דקלה הדר. במאי: קווין ג'ונסון. 2019.

programme.title: בית (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה על חייזר קצת מוזר ומאוד שמח, שבאופן מפתיע מתיידד עם ילדה מכדור הארץ. אירועים שונים מובילים את השניים למסע משותף במכונית מעופפת. דיבוב עברית: גלעד שמואלי, קטי כהן. במאי: טים ג'ונסון. 2015. כ' עב'.

programme.title: החיים הסודיים של חיות המחמד 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. המשך ללהיט מבית אילומיניישן ('המיניונים'). הצצה נוספת לחייהם הסודיים ומלאי ההרפתקאות של צמד הכלבים מקס ודיוק, ויתר חבריהם חיות המחמד, כאשר הבעלים שלהם לא בסביבה. דיבוב: עידו מוסרי. במאי: כריס רנו. 2019. כ' עב'.

programme.title: חבורת חיות המחמד (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. רוג'ר, כלב רחוב קשוח ומחוספס, ובל, חתולה ביתית עשירה ומפונקת נאלצים לשתף פעולה זו עם זה על מנת להשמיד רובוטים מרושעים המבקשים להשתלט על העיר שלהם. דיבוב עב': גל שמי, עדי ארד. 2019. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מאווקה נסיכת היער (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. מאווקה היא נסיכה ביער קסום ותפקידה לשמור עליו ועל הטבע. כאשר בן אנוש ומוסיקאי מוכשר מופיע, ניצוצות האהבה עפים ומאווקה חייבת לבחור בין תפקידה כשומרת היער לבין אהבתה לבן האנוש. דיבוב עב': תובל שפיר. 2023.

programme.title: טרולים (מדובב)
programme.desc: על מנת להציל את חבריה מהברגנים, יוצאת פופי מנהיגת הטרולים האופטימית עם בראנץ' הטרול הנרגן, להרפתקה בעולמות רחוקים. דיבוב: לירון לב, נועה קירל. בימוי: וולט דורן, מייק מיטשל. 2016. כ' עב'.

programme.title: גנוב על החיים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הסרט הרביעי בסדרת סרטי האנימציה המצליחה. גרו ומשפחתו מקבלים למשפחה חבר חדש: גרו ג'וניור, שמתעקש לענות את אביו שרק רוצה קצת אהבה מבנו התינוק. במקביל אויב חדש-ישן מאיים על כל המשפחה. דיבוב: יניב ביטון, ליאת הר לב. 2024.

programme.title: לאסי 2 - הרפתקה חדשה (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. השקט בכפר קטן באוסטריה מופר עם פרשייה של גניבת כלבים גזעיים. לדגל נקראת לאסי, כלבת קולי בעלת תושייה, שבעזרת חושיה החדים עוזרת לילדי הכפר להשיב את הכלבים לבעליהם. דיבוב עב': שרון שחל, אלונה אלכנסדר. 2024.

programme.title: להציל את החווה (מדובב)
programme.desc: דרמת הרפתקאות מרגשת ומצחיקה. אנני וחברה הטוב ביותר - הכלב ראנט יוצאים לתחרות כלבים באנגליה במטרה להציל את החווה המשפחתית באוסטרליה, רק שראנט מאוד ביישן... עם: לילי לה טורה. דיבוב: אמלי קקון סלונים. אוסטרליה/אנגליה, 2024.

programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה. כלבלב מפונק מוצא עצמו ברחוב לאחר שנמלט מהילדים החמדנים של בעליו הקודמים. כעת כשהוא מנסה לשרוד בעולם האמיתי, באים לעזרתו כלב רחוב קשוח ומוזיקאית צעירה. דיבוב: דן קיזלר, דקלה הדר. במאי: קווין ג'ונסון. 2019.(n)

programme.title: החיים הסודיים של חיות המחמד 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. המשך ללהיט מבית אילומיניישן ('המיניונים'). הצצה נוספת לחייהם הסודיים ומלאי ההרפתקאות של צמד הכלבים מקס ודיוק, ויתר חבריהם חיות המחמד, כאשר הבעלים שלהם לא בסביבה. דיבוב: עידו מוסרי. במאי: כריס רנו. 2019. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: חבורת חיות המחמד (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. רוג'ר, כלב רחוב קשוח ומחוספס, ובל, חתולה ביתית עשירה ומפונקת נאלצים לשתף פעולה זו עם זה על מנת להשמיד רובוטים מרושעים המבקשים להשתלט על העיר שלהם. דיבוב עב': גל שמי, עדי ארד. 2019. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: מפרץ ההרפתקאות: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. ריידר וכלבי יחידת החילוץ נקראים לעיר ההרפתקאות על מנת לנסות ולהציל אותה מראש העיר המדינגר, המשחק בצורה מסוכנת עם מזג האוויר בעיר וגרם להרס וחורבן. דיבוב עב': שיר כהן. במאי: קאל ברונקר. 2021. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: צוות לעניין (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות מקסימה מהיוצרים של 'צעצוע של סיפור'. בובת תיאטרון חוברת לבובת כלבלב נטושה, וביחד יוצאים השניים להרפתקה בין מציאות לדמיון ברחבי העיר ניו יורק, בה הם הגיבורים הראשיים. דיבוב עב': ניר ברק, יובל בינדר. 2023.(n)

programme.title: בית (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה על חייזר קצת מוזר ומאוד שמח, שבאופן מפתיע מתיידד עם ילדה מכדור הארץ. אירועים שונים מובילים את השניים למסע משותף במכונית מעופפת. דיבוב עברית: גלעד שמואלי, קטי כהן. במאי: טים ג'ונסון. 2015. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: הרפתקאות בלנקט החתול (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. בלנקט הוא חתול ביתי שמפחד לעזוב את דירתו. לאחר שקייפ, בנו הסקרן מחליט לעזוב את הבית ולצאת להרפתקה בעקבות גן העדן לחתולים, בלנקט חייב להתגבר על עברו ועל הפחד שלו מפני הרחוב. דיבוב לעב'. במאי: גארי וונג, 2018.(n)

programme.title: נורם בעיר הגדולה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. נורם הוא דוב לבן שיכול לדבר עם בני אדם. כאשר פרוייקט מגורים שאפתני מאיים על החיים בקוטב הצפוני, הוא נוסע לניו יורק, יחד עם חבריו הזעירים, למבצע הצלה. מדובב לעברית. במאי: טרבור וול. ארה"ב, 2016. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: מרשעת (מדובב)
programme.desc: העיבוד שובר הקופות והמועמד ל-10 פרסי אוסקר למחזמר המצליח. שנים לפני שהפכה למכשפה הרעה מהמערב, פגשה אלפבה ירוקת העור את גלינדה הפופולרית באקדמיה לכישוף, מפגש שישנה לעד את ארץ עוץ. עם: אריאנה גרנדה. בדיבוב: שירי מיימון. 2024.(n)

programme.title: הצילו! כיווצתי את המורה (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיה. פליקס מכווץ בטעות את מנהלת בית הספר הקשוחה לגובה של 15 ס"מ. כשכולם בטוחים שעשה זאת בכוונה, הוא יוצא להרפתקה להוכיח את חפותו ולמנוע את סגירת ביה"ס. במאי: סוון אונטרוואלד. גרמניה, 2015. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: לאסי 2 - הרפתקה חדשה (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. השקט בכפר קטן באוסטריה מופר עם פרשייה של גניבת כלבים גזעיים. לדגל נקראת לאסי, כלבת קולי בעלת תושייה, שבעזרת חושיה החדים עוזרת לילדי הכפר להשיב את הכלבים לבעליהם. דיבוב עב': שרון שחל, אלונה אלכנסדר. 2024.(n)

programme.title: פארמה - טורינו
programme.desc: שידור חוזר: כדורגל. פארמה - טורינו, ליגה איטלקית, מחזור 5, עונת 2025/26. פארמה לא רוצה להסתבך בתחתית וחייבת כל נקודה.(n)

programme.desc: The ATP Shanghai Masters and the WTA Wuhan Open. Coverage of the events at Qizhong Forest Sports City Arena and Optics Valley International Tennis Center respectively. programme.title: Aporia
programme.desc: Since losing her husband, Sophie has juggled grief, a full-time job, and parenting her devastated daughter. However, when a former physicist reveals a covert time-bending machine, the widow is faced with a difficult choice. Writer/director Jared Moshe's sci-fi drama, starring Judy Greer and Edi Gathegi.(n)

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A determined factory welder leads a double life as an exotic dancer by night. Her real ambition is to become a ballet star, and with the support of her boss and an instructor, she sets out to realise her dreams. Drama, with Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson, Kyle T Heffner and Lee Ving.(n)

programme.title: The Young Messiah
programme.desc: Biblical drama telling the story of Jesus Christ at the age of seven as he and his family depart Egypt to return home to Nazareth and the youngster begins to discover the true extent of his gifts. Adam Greaves-Neal stars, with Sara Lazzaro, Christian McKay and Sean Bean.(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: An alcoholic former professional player reluctantly agrees to train an all-female baseball team during the Second World War. With star player Dottie Hinson and her sister Kit on board, they look set to dominate the league - until sibling rivalry rears its head. Comedy drama, starring Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Tom Hanks and Madonna.(n)

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtis's romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson.(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: A former member of a singing trio, now running a hotel on a Greek island, is reunited with her old bandmates for her daughter's wedding - but is surprised when three of her old flames also show up unexpectedly. The three men have been invited by the bride, who wants to find out which one of them is her father. Musical comedy, with a soundtrack of Abba songs, starring Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Julie Walters, Colin Firth, Stellan Skarsgard and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.(n)

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach.(n)

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A streetwise Brooklyn teenager struggles to cope with a dead-end job and a dysfunctional family. However, he finds an escape in the disco scene, where he falls in love with a woman dreaming of breaking free from her equally poor background to pursue a brighter future in Manhattan. Drama, starring John Travolta, Karen Lynn Gorney and Paul Pape, and featuring songs by the Bee Gees.(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Two female jailbirds imprisoned for murder pull out all the stops to seize the attention of the media. Aided by a slick lawyer, both women are desperate to find fame and fortune and escape the death penalty by winning public sympathy. Musical, starring Renee Zellweger, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Richard Gere, John C Reilly and Queen Latifah.(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.(n)

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
programme.desc: Families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas during the 19th century. Meanwhile, a seasoned cowboy goes on the run with a prostitute and a young lad after killing a fellow gunman. Western, starring Kevin Costner, who also co-wrote and directed, with Sienna Miller and Sam Worthington.(n)

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: A priest in a rural Irish village receives a confession from a man who vows to kill him in one week as punishment for the Catholic Church's history of child abuse. The cleric spends his last seven days trying to put his community's affairs in order, but finds himself surrounded by people who harbour resentments of their own against the Church. Drama, starring Brendan Gleeson, Chris O'Dowd, Kelly Reilly, Aidan Gillen and Dylan Moran.(n)

programme.title: Young at Heart
programme.desc: Three sisters, all talented musicians, fall for the upbeat songwriter who is lodging with them - but when he invites a morose and lonely pianist to help arrange his score, events for the ladies take an unexpected turn. Romantic musical, starring Frank Sinatra, Gig Young, Doris Day, Ethel Barrymore, Dorothy Malone and Elisabeth Fraser.(n)

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.(n)

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney.(n)

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: Having lost her job and her husband, alcoholic Rachel Watson spends time aimlessly travelling on a train. She gets drawn into a web of intrigue when she becomes fascinated by a woman's disappearance. Rachel thinks she has vital evidence in cracking the case, but gaps in her memory cloud her judgment, and before long her own life is endangered. Thriller based on Paula Hawkins' novel, starring Emily Blunt, Rebecca Ferguson, Haley Bennett, Justin Theroux and Luke Evans.(n)

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: The younger son of George V struggles to cope with an uncontrollable stammer, prompting his wife to enlist the aid of an eccentric Australian speech therapist. The support and friendship of the doctor prove invaluable when a crisis places the repressed prince on the throne, just as the outbreak of the Second World War leaves the country in need of a strong king. Oscar-winning fact-based drama, starring Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, Helena Bonham Carter and Guy Pearce.(n)

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.(n)

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: A war veteran criss-crosses America with his disabled brother in tow as he builds a new career as a renowned prizefighter. However, his ruthless determination to make it to the top drives him to betray the people closest to him. Drama, starring Kirk Douglas, Marilyn Maxwell, Arthur Kennedy, Paul Stewart and Ruth Roman.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: An Army officer is accused of murdering a bartender, whom he claims he killed because the man raped his wife. He turns to a tenacious lawyer to get him off the hook, but the attorney faces a challenge because the prosecution alleges the defendant killed the barman because he was having an affair with his wife. Otto Preminger's courtroom drama, starring James Stewart, Ben Gazzara, Lee Remick and Eve Arden.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A high-flying photographer arranges a photoshoot in a Greenwich bookshop, where his head is turned by one of the employees. He persuades the shy bookworm to model for him in Paris, and romance blossoms between them as he endeavours to transform her into a fashion icon. Musical, starring Fred Astaire, Audrey Hepburn, Kay Thompson, Michel Auclair and Robert Flemyng, with songs by George and Ira Gershwin.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney.

Rachel thinks she has vital evidence in cracking the case, but gaps in her memory cloud her judgment, and before long her own life is endangered. programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: The younger son of George V struggles to cope with an uncontrollable stammer, prompting his wife to enlist the aid of an eccentric Australian speech therapist. The support and friendship of the doctor prove invaluable when a crisis places the repressed prince on the throne, just as the outbreak of the Second World War leaves the country in need of a strong king. Oscar-winning fact-based drama, starring Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, Helena Bonham Carter and Guy Pearce.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: A radio DJ contemplates suicide after a listener embarks on a murderous rampage in response to one of his broadcasts. He is saved by a now-homeless former professor of medieval history, who encourages him to retrieve what he claims is the Holy Grail. When the DJ later learns that he is responsible for his saviour's misfortunes, he feels compelled to make amends. Terry Gilliam's comedy drama, with Robin Williams, Jeff Bridges, Amanda Plummer and Mercedes Ruehl.

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: An Army officer is accused of murdering a bartender, whom he claims he killed because the man raped his wife. Otto Preminger's courtroom drama, starring James Stewart, Ben Gazzara, Lee Remick and Eve Arden.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A young soldier devastated by his nightmarish experiences in the Vietnam War is committed to an Army mental hospital. He comes to believe he is a bird, and dreams of taking his fantasy to the logical, ultimate conclusion - by learning to fly. Alan Parker's psychological drama, based on William Wharton's novel, with Matthew Modine, Nicolas Cage, John Harkins, Karen Young and Sandy Baron.

programme.title: Funny Girl
programme.desc: Musical biopic of 1920s singer and comedienne Fanny Brice, who rose from poor beginnings in New York's slums to become an overnight star and the toast of Broadway. Her success, however, came at the price of a turbulent private life and an unhappy marriage to a gambler, who grew increasingly jealous of her fame. Starring an Oscar-winning Barbra Streisand, with Omar Sharif, Kay Medford and Walter Pidgeon.

programme.title: The Fisher King

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: In 1976, Jamaica is dangerously divided across political lines and musician Bob Marley vows to quell the violence by performing at the Smile Jamaica Concert. Two days before the high-profile gig, gunmen break into the singer's home, shooting Bob, his wife Rita and manager Don Taylor. Everyone survives and Marley moves to London with his entourage to begin work on the LP Exodus under Island Records supremo Chris Blackwell. Biographical drama, starring Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch and James Norton.

Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.

programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A single man gets the chance to turn his unhappy life around when his father reveals that they both have the ability to travel through time and change their personal history. He uses his newfound talent to try to improve his love life and win the heart of an American woman he has fallen for. Romantic fantasy comedy, with Domhnall Gleeson, Rachel McAdams and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A widowed father is coping badly with his wife's death, but his son is convinced that what he really needs is some new romance in his life. He arranges for his dad to go on a radio phone-in show, and his touching story moves a reporter to respond, even though she is already engaged. She returns to her fiance, but the boy, certain she is the woman for his father, plots to bring them together. Romantic comedy, with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German army, and face a tense wait for evacuation, during a fierce battle in northern France during the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's wartime drama, which he wrote, directed and produced, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy, Mark Rylance and Fionn Whitehead.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Gerda Wegener unveils a portrait of her husband Einar dressed as a woman in 1920s Copenhagen. Einar realises that the woman in the painting is his true identity, and decides to become one of the first people to undergo sex reassignment surgery. Period drama based on David Ebershoff's novel inspired by the true story of artist Lili Elbe, starring Eddie Redmayne and an Oscar-winning Alicia Vikander.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A naive young literature student's life is thrown into turmoil by an affair with a mysterious billionaire. Erotic drama based on EL James' bestseller, starring Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: An alcoholic former professional player reluctantly agrees to train an all-female baseball team during the Second World War. With star player Dottie Hinson and her sister Kit on board, they look set to dominate the league - until sibling rivalry rears its head. Comedy drama, starring Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Tom Hanks and Madonna.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A widowed father is coping badly with his wife's death, but his son is convinced that what he really needs is some new romance in his life. He arranges for his dad to go on a radio phone-in show, and his touching story moves a reporter to respond, even though she is already engaged. She returns to her fiance, but the boy, certain she is the woman for his father, plots to bring them together. Romantic comedy, with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German army, and face a tense wait for evacuation, during a fierce battle in northern France during the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's wartime drama, which he wrote, directed and produced, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy, Mark Rylance and Fionn Whitehead.(n)

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.(n)

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.(n)

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: In 1976, Jamaica is dangerously divided across political lines and musician Bob Marley vows to quell the violence by performing at the Smile Jamaica Concert. Two days before the high-profile gig, gunmen break into the singer's home, shooting Bob, his wife Rita and manager Don Taylor. Everyone survives and Marley moves to London with his entourage to begin work on the LP Exodus under Island Records supremo Chris Blackwell. Biographical drama, starring Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch and James Norton.(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.(n)

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: The bookish Anastasia Steele and damaged billionaire playboy Christian Grey continue their sadomasochistic relationship, while their safety is threatened by strangers from his past. While Christian wrestles with his inner demons, Anastasia must confront the anger and envy of the women who came before her. Erotic drama sequel to Fifty Shades of Grey, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Eric Johnson, Bella Heathcote and Rita Ora.(n)

programme.title: Rent
programme.desc: Musical set in 1980s New York, following a year in the life of young artists living in the East Village. A would-be film-maker pines for his lost love and an HIV-positive musician tries to recover from his drug addiction, while their landlord abandons his bohemian ways for the pursuit of wealth. Rosario Dawson stars alongside members of the original Broadway cast, including Taye Diggs, Anthony Rapp and Adam Pascal.(n)

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the house's secrets and end the bloodshed. Horror starring Tanner Stine and Kaylee Kaneshiro.(n)

programme.title: Juliet & Romeo
programme.desc: Two lovers find themselves central figures in a journey of battles and betrayal. Musical version of the classic tale, starring Clara Rugaard, Jamie Ward, Rebel Wilson and Jason Isaacs.(n)

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles.(n)

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When best friends and roommates Dreux and Alyssa discover the latter's boyfriend has blown their rent money, the duo faces a race against time to avoid eviction. Comedy, starring Keke Palmer and SZA.(n)

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder.(n)

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles.(n)

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles.(n)

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers' version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson.(n)

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbet's drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn.(n)

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray.(n)

programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a luxury car dealer is found dead, detectives suspect one of his lovers, but lack of evidence stalls the case for a year until one clue breaks it wide open.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: An arrest is finally made five years after a mother of four disappeared while she was close to her apartment in Montana.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A community is left in shock when a Cornell student and star athlete gets caught in the middle of a homicide investigation.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: After shedding hundreds of pounds, a popular kindergarten teacher goes missing; investigators find a link between her weight loss and her disappearance.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Rachel Buffett, whose former fiance, Daniel Wozniak, was convicted of two grisly murders, talks about being at the center of the investigation.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A man who was recently acquitted of the murder of his ex-girlfriend's 12-year-old son tells his story; interview with the victim's mother and key players in the case.

programme.title: The Swift Effect
programme.desc: Through the lens of influencers, podcasters and established media figures, this episode shows how Taylor Swift has redefined the balance of power between artist, audience, and press.

programme.title: The Swift Effect
programme.desc: From Taylor's Swifts strategic re-recording of albums to her genre shift from country to pop, we dive into how her bold moves have empowered artists and redefined what it means to take control in a male-dominated industry.

programme.title: The Swift Effect
programme.sub-title: The Swift Effect on the NFL
programme.desc: Taylor's presence has brought a new wave of attention to the NFL, attracting a fresh fanbase and transforming viewership patterns; examine the cultural impact of her game-day appearances, from increased TV ratings to boosted merchandise sales.

programme.title: The Swift Effect
programme.desc: Focusing on Miami where Taylor returns to the U.S., examining her effect on the city's economy and spotlighting the University of Miami's course inspired by her branding and influence.

programme.title: The Swift Effect
programme.desc: A look at Taylor Swift's lasting legacy and where her influence may lead next; looking through the lens of individuals she's uplifted, such as a photographer who's documented her career for over a decade, we see the ripple effects of her journey.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Police suspect a serial killer when two women and their teenage daughters are murdered in Maryland; during the search for clues, it's revealed that a master thief is the key to solving the mystery.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A teen's murder shakes a Nevada community, especially when two unlikely people make confessions.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The trial and murder conviction of Jodi Arias and the salacious relationship that ended in tragedy.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The security cameras at the home of a wife and mother of three's home may hold the key to solving the mystery of her disappearance.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The mystery of a Florida hotel owner's disappearance confounds family, friends and the detectives investigating the case.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Campus cops make a terrible discovery in a dorm room after a boyfriend's weekend visit goes horribly wrong.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: After a sudden marriage creates tension between two families, a murder exposes secrets, lies and a long-buried mystery.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A thump heard by the children in a Carlsbad, Calif., home one summer morning is the first clue in a shocking mystery involving family secrets.(n)

programme.desc: Survivors of the Westgate Mall attack in Nairobi, Kenya, share their stories.(n)

programme.desc: Co-lead investigator in the Steven Avery case Tom Fassbender discusses the case and allegations investigators coerced Avery's nephew, Brendan Dassey, into making a false confession.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Over the course of a year, violent crimes are committed against two women from the same church; evidence is revealed that suggests the two cases are not just coincidences.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A car belonging to a missing man erupts in a blaze, leading to clues regarding his whereabouts.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When an Iowa woman is attacked while home alone with her three children, the confrontation turns deadly.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A look at the crimes committed by Charles Manson and his followers in 1969, including archival footage and interviews with those close to the events.(n)

programme.title: Sunday Today With Willie Geist
programme.desc: Sharp conversational coverage of the week's news, along with in-depth profiles of the people and personalities shaping American culture, assessing the highs and lows of the week and looking ahead to the next one.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Press
programme.desc: Interviews with public figures and those making news, setting the political agenda and spotlighting the impact Washington decision-making has on Americans.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Authorities become suspicious when a pastor loses a second wife in an accident.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A microscopic clue and a stroke of luck help authorities solve the murder of a young woman that took place inside her Jacksonville Beach, Fla., home.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A man dies in a shooting incident after tempers flare in a confrontation in Montana's Glacier National Park.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A woman's story about an abduction and murder helps reopen a decades-old case that has weighed heavy on a New York town.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The case of Johnny Hincapie, whose conviction for the 1990 murder of a Utah tourist in New York -- a case that represented a tipping point in the city's law enforcement -- was overturned after 25 years.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: After losing a hotly contested custody battle, a woman disappears with her 11-month-old daughter; the child's father searches four continents for almost two decades before reaching an emotional conclusion.(n)

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, former CIA operative Steve Vail is lured out of retirement to confront a rogue assassin blackmailing the agency.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: When a blogger interviews a tech guru and stops an attack, he finds a strange ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past. Sky Original film starring Josh Hutcherson.

programme.title: Save The Cinema
programme.desc: Sky Original film following Welsh hairdresser Liz Evans' fight to save her small town's theatre. Poignant British drama based on a true story starring Samantha Morton.

programme.title: Exhibiting Forgiveness
programme.desc: A Black artist on the path to success is derailed by an unexpected visit from his estranged father, a recovering addict desperate to reconcile.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: Ex-Formula 1 racer Enzo Ferrari launches his team into the perilous 1,000-mile Mille Miglia race. Sky Original film from Michael Mann with Adam Driver and PenÃ©lope Cruz.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Discover Lee Miller, the war photographer who heroically documented the truth of the Nazi regime. Sky Original film with Kate Winslet.

programme.title: Luckiest Man In America
programme.desc: An unemployed ice cream truck driver steps onto the game show Press Your Luck harbouring a secret: the key to endless money. Thriller with Walton Goggins.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: The Holy Roman Empire where Europe's nations fiercely vie for supremacy and the Austrians, desiring more land, encroach upon Switzerland, a serene, pastoral nation.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Ex-soldier-turned-window-cleaner Daisy Ridley is tasked with rescuing 300 hostages after activists hijack a gala in a skyscraper. From the director of Casino Royale.

programme.title: Fight Or Flight
programme.desc: Wildly entertaining, gory action thriller from the producers of John Wick. Josh Hartnett takes on a plane full of assassins in a first-class fight for survival.

programme.title: Get Away
programme.desc: Get ready for a killer holiday! A family getaway turns deadly when they encounter a serial killer on their island. Sky Original horror with Nick Frost. With strong violence.

programme.title: Sharp Corner
programme.desc: A dedicated family man becomes obsessed with saving car accident victims on the corner in front of his house - an obsession that could cost him everything. Thriller.

programme.title: Daddio
programme.desc: During a taxi ride home, a young woman and her driver speak openly about relationships, power dynamics and loss. Sky Original film with Dakota Johnson and Sean Penn.

programme.title: A Good Person
programme.desc: Drama about how one split second can change the trajectory of our lives. Sky Original film written and directed by Zach Braff, starring Morgan Freeman and Florence Pugh.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.desc: While quarantining at her family's lake house during the pandemic, student Parker and her best friend encounter an unexpected visitor. Slasher from the creator of Scream.

programme.desc: On a decimated Earth, a father and his twin sons must fight to survive against the ferocious creatures who awaken at night. Horror thriller starring Nicolas Cage.

programme.desc: In this creepy prequel to hit horror The Conjuring, a married couple are tormented by a doll that has been possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.desc: Young orphan Linda finds herself drawn to a creepy porcelain doll that seems to have evil in its cold, dead eyes... Horror.
